forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle clarity hints at the majesty of the day ahead. The sky, a soft palette of blue adorned with wispy clouds, welcomes the sun which will rise steadily, warming the city with a restrained grace. In the distance, the Golden Gate Bridge stands beckoning, partially shrouded in the iconic marine layer that seems to be retreating, hopeful as it succumbs to the advance of daylight. The wind carries a refreshing coolness, rustling through the streets and suggesting light layers for comfort; a light jacket or sweater could serve well against the gentle breeze that brushes through.

As the sun reaches its zenith, temperatures are expected to rise pleasantly, yet a touch of the brisk afternoon remains, encouraging leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the local cafes where one can savor a warm beverage while soaking in the energy of the city. For those who thrive on exploration, the parks offer an inviting space to unwind and enjoy the blend of urban life with nature, where laughter and conversation can accompany the crisp air. The evening promises partly cloudy skies, inviting a tranquil end to the day, as the temperatures dip invitingly to around 49 degrees. A feeling of relaxation pervades the air, perfect for an evening spent with friends, perhaps enjoying a casual dinner, as the soft winds continue to wrap around the bustling streets and quaint corners of this beloved city.
